### 1 Import packages & data

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf)
```

```{r}

mpsz <- st_read(
  dsn = "data/geospatial/MPSZ-2019",
  layer = "MPSZ-2019")

```

### 2 Reading Data

st_geometry(mpsz)
